subject: Marketing
title: The Attention Auction
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Attention Auction.

hook.text: TikTok, YouTube, Netflix, and podcasts all compete for the same 24 hours in your day.

buildup.text: Advertising has always been an attention game. Today, competition for that attention is brutal.

discovery.text: The winner isn't the biggest spender. It's whoever creates the most value per second of attention.

twist.text: Consumers now pay to avoid ads. Ad-free subscriptions are the fastest-growing media model.

climax.text: Advertising must evolve from interruption to invitationâ€”or keep losing the auction.

punchline.text: Earn attention or keep paying more to steal it.

quiz.question: What is the fastest-growing media model today?
options: Ad-free subscription services where consumers pay to avoid ads
Free newspapers funded entirely by classified ads
Television networks with more commercial breaks
